parameter_description: Selects the waveform of VCO 1
Selects the waveform of VCO 2
Adjusts the frequency of VCO 2
Adjusts the beat frequency of VCO 2
Enables and disables Hard Sync
Enables and disables Note Sync
Adjusts the LFO frequency
Selects the waveform for the LFO
usage: 0-21:Triangle; 22-43: Square; 44-65: Saw Down; 66-87: Saw Up; 88-109: S&H; 110-127: Filter EG

parameter_description: Adjusts the modulation amount to the VCOs
Adjusts the modulation amount to the VCF
Sends LFO to VCO2 Only
Re-triggers the LFO to the start of the cycle
Enables or disables the ability of the LFO to sync with MIDI CLOCK messages
Sets the LFO sync clock divider
usage: 0-6: 4 Whole Notes; 7-12: 3 Whole Notes; 13-18: 2 Whole Notes; 19-24: Whole Note + Half; 25-30: Whole Note; 31-36: Dotted 1/2 Note; 37-42: Whole Note Triplet; 43-48: 1/2 Note; 49-54: Dotted 1/4 Note Triplet; 55-60: 1/2 Note Triplet; 61-67: 1/4 Note; 68-73: Dotted 1/8 Note; 74-79: 1/4 Note Triplet; 80-85: 1/8 Note; 86-91: Dotted 1/16 Note; 92-97: 1/8 Note Triplet; 98-103: 1/16 Note; 104-109: 1/16 Note Triplet; 110-115: 1/32 Note; 116-121: 1/32 Note Triplet; 122-127: 1/64 Note Triplet

parameter_description: Modulation performance control
Adjusts the level of VCO 1
Adjusts the level of VCO 2
Adjusts the level of the external audio input
Adjusts the filter cutoff frequency
Adjusts the filter resonance parameter
Adjusts the envelope generator amount affecting the cutoff
Sets the amount of keyboard tracking for the filter
Sets the amount of filter velocity sensitivity
Adjusts the filter envelope attack time
Adjusts the filter envelope decay and release time
Adjusts the filter envelope sustain level
Adjusts the volume envelope attack time
Adjusts the volume envelope decay and release time
Adjusts the volume envelope sustain level
Sets the state of the release parameter
Sets the state of the envelope trigger
usage: 0-42: Legato On; 43-85: Legato Off; 86-127: EG Reset

parameter_description: Sets the state of the glide switch
Adjusts the glide (portmanteau) time
Sets the type of glide
usage: 0-42: Linear Constant Rate; 43-85: Linear Constant Time; 86-127: Exponential

parameter_description: Sets the state of the legato lide parameter when glide is enabled
usage: 0-63: Always Glide; 64-127: Glide on Legato Notes Only

parameter_description: Pitch wheel down performance control
usage: 0-15: Off; 16-31: 2 Semitones; 32-47: 3 Semitones; 48-63: 4 Semitones; 64-79: 5 Semitones; 80-95: 7 Semitones; 96-111: 12 Semitones; 112-127: 24 Semitones

parameter_description: Pitch wheel up performance control
usage: 0-15: Off; 16-31: 2 Semitones; 32-47: 3 Semitones; 48-63: 4 Semitones; 64-79: 5 Semitones; 80-95: 7 Semitones; 96-111: 12 Semitones; 112-127: 24 Semitones

parameter_description: Sets the note priority
usage: 0-42: Low Note; 43-85: High Note; 86-127: Last Note

parameter_description: Adjusts the audio output and headphone level
Sets the amount of volume velocity sensitivity
Sets the state of the local control off parameter
MIDI panic message
MIDI panic message
